data.title: DJ Republic
data.meta_description: Welcome to the future of DJ's and function bands with DJ Republic. Fusing all the greatest elements of live music and electronica, DJ Republic are perfect for your event if you want to stand out from the crowd and keep your dancefloor rammed. A unique function band for hire with Seventh Second.
data.text:
Welcome to the future of music with DJ Republic. Combining the greatest attributes of a live function band and DJ all at once, DJ Republic are perfect for your event if you want to stand out from the crowd and keep your dancefloor rammed. DJ Republic are a new and unique function band for hire with Seventh Second and we are happy to show you more!

If you want your wedding, party or function partying late into the night with hit after hit expertly performed by a high energy outfit, then you've come to the right place. With years of experience performing in all sorts of professional function bands, members of DJ Republic know how to party and perform.

Although a relatively new function band, DJ Republic have already toured France, Italy, Dubai, India and Abu Dhabi perfecting their unique live show just for people like you. Their videos say so much more than we could about their unique take on live entertainment so don't leave before you've taken a glimpse at what's on offer.

With a huge repertoire covering modern dance classics and popular club music amongst other genres, DJ Republic can take requests and offer a truly flexible and bespoke service.

Their line up consist of male and female lead vocals, bass guitar, guitar, trumpet and expert DJ'ing as standard and DJ Republic can add extra vocalists, sax, electric violin and percussion - totally tailoring to your needs.

Don't worry about technical requirements either as DJ Republic provide state of the art light and audio equipment plus PLI and PAT certificates to keep you and your guests safe and entertained no matter how big or small your venue. If you want that unique, memorable live entertainment that you and your guests will speak of for years to come, DJ Republic should be at the top of your list. A full dancefloor is guaranteed and you will enjoy yourself almost too much with this one of a kind live DJ function band for hire.
